ls-product.title: Arena Self-Draining Dish Rack
ls-product.description: Self-Draining Dish Rack, 4 x 17 x 14” / 10 x 43 x 35cm, white/green.The innovative, compact design of this stylish dish rack provides lots of space for draining and storing plates, bowls, glasses and utensils. Flexible ribs hold dishes securely in place, helping to prevent chips and scratches while drying. The distinctive, concentric design and sloping base, channel water away quickly and efficiently and the integrated spout enables it to be drained directly into the sink. Extra-large utensil holders also ensure Arena is as practical as it is stylish. ***Dishes not included***

ls-product.title: iPad with Retina display Wi-Fi 128GB - BLACK
ls-product.description: Pick up the iPad with Retina display and suddenly, it’s clear. You’re actually touching your photos, reading a book, playing the piano. Nothing comes between you and what you love. That’s because the fundamental elements of iPad — the display, the processor, the cameras, the wireless connection — all work together to create the best possible experience. And they make iPad capable of so much more than you ever imagined.
ls-product.specification: 9.7-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit Multi-Touch display with IPS technology Dual-core A6X with quad-core graphics 128GB of storage Wi-Fi / Bluetooth 4.0 HD video recording (1080p) 5-megapixel iSight camera Built-in speaker / microphone
